description:
If it's one thing that freaks Mason out, it's women! Naked women! Especially a life like sex doll of a naked women!

Luckily for Jake Lyons, Mason's new friend, he had one laying around to play a practical joke with.

After getting really creeped out by the doll, Mason feels he has to show Jake who's the boss, and by boss, we mean the Top. That's right. Mason takes his twinky new buddy and slams his tight ass with his fat cock. Not that Jake minded that at all.

Enjoy!
title: His Worse Fear
